pr_title: [webserver] Make BE webserver handle static files

timeline.message:
[webserver] Make BE webserver handle static files

Make BE webserver handle static files, e.g. css, js, ico, then we can make
BE website more pretty.

timeline.bodyText: Is it necessary to be a config? I think it can be hard coded?
timeline.author: morningman

replies.bodyText: Seems not necessary, I'll remove it.
replies.author: acelyc111
